description: The <Code /> component allows you to display the source code.

important.title: Important ⚡️
important.text1: Make sure to import the monospace font into your project before using the component. By default, Wuki UI uses IBM Plex Mono, here are some examples of how to integrate it into your project:
important.text2: Then you can import it to your entry point.
important.text3: You can find all the basic information at

examples.title: Default
examples.description: By default, you don't need to pass any props other than `code` to this component. It is beautiful and convenient out of the box. <Code /> will automatically adjust to the transmitted data.

examples.title: Inline
examples.description: The `Code` component can be used as an insert into the text, for this you need to pass the props `inline` component
